verses.verse: And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>: <S%H8439>Tola<s%>, and <S%H6312>Puah<s%>, <S%H3437>Jashub<s%>, and <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8439>Tola<s%>: <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%>, and <S%H3400>Jeriel<s%>, and <S%H3181>Jahmai<s%>, and <S%H3005>Ibsam<s%>, and <S%H8050>Shemuel<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, to <S%H8439>wit<s%>, of Tola; <S%H2428>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of valor in their <S%H8435>generations<s%>: their <S%H4557>number<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>: <S%H3156>Izrahiah<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3156>Izrahiah<s%>: <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, <S%H3449>Isshiah<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%>; all of them chief <S%H7218>men<s%>.

And with <S%H8435>them<s%>, by their generations, after their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, were <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; for they had <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> among all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H2428>mighty<s%> men of <S%H1368>valor<s%>, reckoned in all by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%>, were <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.
The sons of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>: <S%H1106>Bela<s%>, and <S%H1071>Becher<s%>, and <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%>: <S%H675>Ezbon<s%>, and <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%>, and <S%H5901>Iri<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%>; <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>; and they were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher<s%>: <S%H2160>Zemirah<s%>, and <S%H3135>Joash<s%>, and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>, and <S%H454>Elioenai<s%>, and <S%H6018>Omri<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jeremoth<s%>, and <S%H29>Abijah<s%>, and <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, and <S%H5964>Alemeth<s%>. All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher<s%>.

And they were <S%H3187>reckoned<s%> by <S%H8435>genealogy<s%>, after their generations, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>: <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%>: <S%H3274>Jeush<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and <S%H164>Ehud<s%>, and <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%>, and <S%H2133>Zethan<s%>, and <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, and <S%H300>Ahishahar<s%>.

All these were <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, according to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1368>houses<s%>, mighty men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>.
Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> <S%H2650>also<s%>, and Huppim, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5893>Ir<s%>, <S%H2366>Hushim<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H313>Aher<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>: <S%H3185>Jahziel<s%>, and <S%H1476>Guni<s%>, and <S%H3337>Jezer<s%>, and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: <S%H844>Asriel<s%>, whom his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> the <S%H761>Aramitess<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%>: she <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>:

and <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2650>Huppim<s%> and <S%H8206>Shuppim<s%>, whose <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> was <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>: and <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> had <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

And <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6570>Peresh<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> was <S%H8329>Sheresh<s%>; and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H198>Ulam<s%> and <S%H7552>Rakem<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%>: <S%H917>Bedan<s%>. These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H4447>Hammolecheth<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H379>Ishhod<s%>, and <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>, and <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%> were <S%H291>Ahian<s%>, and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%>, and <S%H3949>Likhi<s%>, and <S%H593>Aniam<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%>, and <S%H1260>Bered<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H497>Eleadah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,

and <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5827>Ezer<s%>, and <S%H496>Elead<s%>, whom the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%> that were <S%H3205>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%>, because they came <S%H3381>down<s%> to take <S%H3947>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.
And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to comfort <S%H5162>him<s%>.

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, because it went <S%H7451>evil<s%> with his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> was <S%H7609>Sheerah<s%>, who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H8481>nether<s%> and the <S%H5945>upper<s%>, and <S%H242>Uzzen-sheerah<s%>.
And <S%H7506>Rephah<s%> was his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7566>Resheph<s%>, and <S%H8520>Telah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8465>Tahan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Ladan <S%H3936><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H476>Elishama<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Nun <S%H5126><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And their <S%H272>possessions<s%> and <S%H4186>habitations<s%> were <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H4217>thereof<s%>, and eastward <S%H5295>Naaran<s%>, and <S%H4628>westward<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H7927>thereof<s%>; Shechem also and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H5804>thereof<s%>, unto Azzah and the towns <S%H1323>thereof<s%>;

and by the <S%H3027>borders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>. In these <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>: <S%H3232>Imnah<s%>, and <S%H3438>Ishvah<s%>, and <S%H3440>Ishvi<s%>, and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>: <S%H2268>Heber<s%>, and <S%H4439>Malchiel<s%>, who was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1269>Birzaith<s%>.
And <S%H2268>Heber<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>, and <S%H7763>Shomer<s%>, and <S%H2369>Hotham<s%>, and <S%H7774>Shua<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>: <S%H6457>Pasach<s%>, and <S%H1118>Bimhal<s%>, and <S%H6220>Ashvath<s%>. These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer<s%>: <S%H277>Ahi<s%>, and <S%H7303>Rohgah<s%>, <S%H3160>Jehubbah<s%>, and <S%H758>Aram<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1987>Helem<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>: <S%H6690>Zophah<s%>, and <S%H3234>Imna<s%>, and <S%H8028>Shelesh<s%>, and <S%H6000>Amal<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6690>Zophah<s%>: <S%H5477>Suah<s%>, and <S%H2774>Harnepher<s%>, and <S%H7777>Shual<s%>, and <S%H1275>Beri<s%>, and <S%H3236>Imrah<s%>,
Bezer <S%H1221><s%>, and <S%H1936>Hod<s%>, and <S%H8037>Shamma<s%>, and <S%H8030>Shilshah<s%>, and <S%H3506>Ithran<s%>, and <S%H878>Beera<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether<s%>: <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, and <S%H6462>Pispa<s%>, and <S%H690>Ara<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5925>Ulla<s%>: <S%H733>Arah<s%>, and <S%H2592>Hanniel<s%>, and <S%H7525>Rizia<s%>.

All these were the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, <S%H1305>choice<s%> and mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%>. And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them <S%H4557>reckoned<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> for service in <S%H6635>war<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.
